body.p:
Louisville Ky May 23/62
Hon: B Mcgoffin Govr.

Dear Sir: At the solicitation of a friend of mine here I enclose you the letter of H. T. Tomlinson Esq of Saint Louis requesting the appointment of Comr. for Ky in Mo. I am assured he is worthy the trust and hope you will grant his request
